column1: # This partition is used for recovery mode when button is pressed at boot
# Uses "ota_2" subtype (0x12) so bootloader can boot into it when requested
# Size: 1MB (0x100000) - needed for Bluedroid with A2DP compiled in
#   - ota_1: secondary app partition for OTA updates
# OTA alternates between ota_0 and ota_1.
# NOTE: app partition offsets must be 0x10000-aligned.
# OTA data (stores boot partition state for rollback)
# Storage partition for sound effects and other files
# Location: After otadata (0x612000 to end of 8MB flash = ~1976KB)
